name: frost - pretty xmas sweater
notes:
***join the coziest christmas knit-along with svarta fåret – the pretty xmas kal!
this year we’re knitting the christmas sweater frost, designed by none other than knitwear designer and author anna bauer. share your excitement and yarn choices in the [facebook group pretty xmas kal][1]!***

we are happy to be able to share our patterns with you for free! unfortunately, we are not able to answer dm’s here on ravelry.
however, we hope you will like the pattern and will enjoy seeing your project come to life!

**inspiration and free patterns**
follow svarta fåret on [instagram][2]
